channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming
channel.description: Please add a child board to general programming titled 'Projects'. I'd love to have a place to post my non-rs2 related projects. This is also beneficial since teams can use the board for recruitment.

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I think we can come to the general consensus that unless we see a rise in active projects in the current programming boards, then a separate board is not needed.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

We had a decision to make. Either we would continue to encourage general discussion and basically invite everyone who wanted to do RSPS development to go to a better community for it, or shift our focus back to the reason this community was created. I believe we should focus on RSPS development. General programming will continue to be used more and more in the future, once people are more familiar with the changed layout. The programming boards were on the bottom of Moparisthebest.com, too, so I see no reason why these can’t be equally successful. All it takes is time.

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming

item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:36, topic:445487”]Not sure I agree with that t4, it can be a hassle to have to use more than one forum.

It would be better logically just to combine both forums really.[/quote]

Nuh. The programming section back then was full of rsps bullshit in the wrong section. Hence the reason we separated the two. To be honest though, i give the MITB side another 6 months before they decide to remove it. Everyone has left. Every face is new.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:31, topic:445487”][quote author=Tree link=topic=548265.msg4070504#msg4070504 date=1344296050]
If the programming section was more active, I would give my support. However, that’s not the case.

@the board merge discussion in this thread: Theres a lengthy discussion about this in another thread. This solution seems to be working fine, even if there is only four of us wandering the halls of MITB nowadays.
[/quote]
it used to be fairly active until SOMEONE MOVED IT TO THE FUKKIN BOTTOM OF THE FORUMS[/quote]^

according to what the mods have claimed in the we say goodbye to the old bulbasaur topic they make out like mopar used to be revolved around rsps and now it’s revolved around several languages.

I disagree with that though, they are focusing on more rsps than several languages, so this doesn’t make sense.

If they were to move the general programming board at the top which branched to several languages I would agree with their statement.

Read full topic

item.source: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:27, topic:445487”]I also supported that idea Rich, but Taharok convinced me it was a bad idea. We have something of around 180 boards (probably around 150 if you remove duplicates, and probably like 120 if you remove private boards) on the four sites combined, and that really is too much for one index I think. However, I also personally believe that we could re-categorize MITB so that there aren’t so many boards (moreso condense them; if we merged we probably wouldn’t need a smartphone board for example, whereas it could probably just have an ‘electronics category’)

The current ‘best’ solution that was come up with though is that each subforum is basically considered as a cateogory of MITB, and then MITB is the ‘general’ site. All general sections (including programming) would be removed from MPSC and other subforums and merged to MITB, and then the sites would be better linked together and such.[/quote]
A lot of the boards on Moparisthebest could just be merged into a General Discussion board or made into child boards themselves (especially for GameDev, I don’t think you need all of those different boards when they could be cut down into ~5 or so child boards, with one big general one) to make the index smaller. Some of them are completely useless, anyway.

I just think we should be moved away from split websites to expand the community and overall discussion. Yes, people can already go over and get involved in those boards, but not many are willing to, or are even aware of them to do so.

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I also supported that idea Rich, but Taharok convinced me it was a bad idea. We have something of around 180 boards (probably around 150 if you remove duplicates, and probably like 120 if you remove private boards) on the four sites combined, and that really is too much for one index I think. However, I also personally believe that we could re-categorize MITB so that there aren’t so many boards (moreso condense them; if we merged we probably wouldn’t need a smartphone board for example, whereas it could probably just have an ‘electronics category’)

The current ‘best’ solution that was come up with though is that each subforum is basically considered as a cateogory of MITB, and then MITB is the ‘general’ site. All general sections (including programming) would be removed from MPSC and other subforums and merged to MITB, and then the sites would be better linked together and such.

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:25, topic:445487”][quote author=t4 link=topic=548265.msg4020182#msg4020182 date=1339965664]

Imo the GameDev part of the site should be changed to just Dev, and all things to do with programming unrelated to rsps can be handled there. At the moment the GameDev side isn’t getting any use.

I think game dev should just move back to here. I don’t think general programming should go over their either - I cbf to sign into 3 sites, and I’m sure others feel the same way. Because of this, posting stuff on gamedev would prove fruitless.
[/quote]
This. I’m in favor of merging everything to one site (including moparisthebest, which was touched on in another topic). I know a lot of people would be pissed at the overwhelming number of boards (which you can just collapse the boards you don’t care for, like I have all private server related boards hidden), but it’s more convenient to navigate, in my opinion.[/quote]

Well said Rich. I would really like it if all the sites were into one, including moparcraft too. There would be much more activity in every board/section too. I never posted in the other topic originally because I figured people were just trolling and weren’t serious. However, it seems more people are actually supporting it and it appeals to me.

I doubt MITB will act on it though and if he did it would take several months for him to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Child board to General Programming
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:5, topic:445487”][quote author=TheHolyGrail link=topic=548265.msg4020179#msg4020179 date=1339965317]
Imo the GameDev part of the site should be changed to just Dev, and all things to do with programming unrelated to rsps can be handled there. At the moment the GameDev side isn’t getting any use.
[/quote]
I think game dev should just move back to here. I don’t think general programming should go over their either - I cbf to sign into 3 sites, and I’m sure others feel the same way. Because of this, posting stuff on gamedev would prove fruitless.[/quote]
This. I’m in favor of merging everything to one site (including moparisthebest, which was touched on in another topic). I know a lot of people would be pissed at the overwhelming number of boards (which you can just collapse the boards you don’t care for, like I have all private server related boards hidden), but it’s more convenient to navigate, in my opinion.

Read full topic
